TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConfigurationConverterBase extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter
Public MustInherit Class ConfigurationConverterBase Inherits TypeConverter
public ref class ConfigurationConverterBase abstract : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

summary.span: 配置转换器类型的基类。

span.span: The base class for the configuration converter types.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 是配置类型的转换器的基类。The is the base class for the converter configuration types. 这些是将字符串转换的类型、 配置文件，与相关的强类型属性中找到。These are types that convert strings, found in the configuration file, to and from the related strongly typed properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示如何从派生类创建自定义转换器类型。The following code examples show how to derive from the class to create a custom converter type. 此外的示例演示如何在自定义节中使用此类型。Also, the examples show how to use this type in a custom section. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义转换器类型从类。The following code example shows how to create a custom converter type from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/CS/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/VB/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何定义使用先前的自定义的自定义部分转换器。The following code example shows how to define a custom section that uses the previous custom converter. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection/CS/ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection/VB/ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和修改配置文件使用自定义的一部分。The following code example shows how to create and modify a configuration file using the previous custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase/CS/ConfigurationConverterBase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase/VB/ConfigurationConverterBase.vb#1)] 下面是根据上面的示例使用的配置摘录。The following is a configuration excerpt as used by the previous example. ```xml
```

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下使用系统提供的转换器类型，因为时，才需要必须创建自己的转换类型时，构造函数。Because you normally use the converter types provided by the system, the only time you need the constructor is when you must create your own conversion type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定是否可以在强类型化的属性来获取配置文件中使用的值字符串上执行的转换。The method determines whether a conversion can be performed on strongly typed properties to obtain value strings used in the configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法来创建自定义转换器类型。The following example code shows how to override the method to create a custom converter type. 此外，示例演示如何在自定义节中使用此类型。Also, the example shows how to use this type in a custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/CS/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/VB/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定是否可以将配置文件中包含的字符串转换相关的强类型属性。The method determines whether the strings contained in the configuration file can be converted to the related strongly typed properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法来创建自定义转换器类型。The following example code shows how to override the method to create a custom converter type. 此外，示例演示如何在自定义节中使用此类型。Also, the example shows how to use this type in a custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/CS/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/VB/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.vb#2)]
